messages.subject: PAGING JIM GILBERT
messages.msgSnippet: Jim, I m trying to send you email that bounces.  I ve just noticed some text that reads: : host mx4.EARTHLINK.NET[209.86.93.229] said:
messages.messageBody:
Jim,

I'm trying to send you email that bounces. I've just noticed some text that reads:

<jggilbert@...>: host mx4.EARTHLINK.NET[209.86.93.229] said: 550 550
Dynamic/zombied/spam IPs blocked. Write
blockedbyearthlink@... (in reply to MAIL FROM command)

How can I get through to you with some attached images???

Thanks guys,

Barry Thomas.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
